name: Blue Phoenix [In development]
description:
Blue Phoenix is a game about working at the front desk of a hotel. It features game play mechanics such as:

  • Terrible people.
  • Leaking sprinklers.
  • Existential Crises.
  • Inadequate job training.
  • A Smile button
  • Dead end careers.
  • Unrealistic life expectations.
  • Free coffee and breakfast

Enjoy your stay at the Blue Phoenix Hotel, and remember: "It's your every tomorrow, today!"
